Related repos

  • Rust bindings for Python, build native modules or run Python from Rust
  • Python 3 interpreter built in Rust, runs on WebAssembly, embeddable in Rust apps
  • Gradual programming language for teaching Python
  • turn python projects into executables
  • drag and drop tool for building Python GUIs, outputs clean code
  • Obfuscates Python scripts and binds them to machines
  • Python linter and code formatter, written in Rust
  • Security vulnerability scanner for Python projects, written in Rust
